RACE.RACE_TEXT: PENN NATIONAL RACE 1 6F Dirt CR: 62. Claiming Purse 10000. (PLUS UP TO 40% PABF) FOR FILLIES AND MARES FOUR YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE SINCE SEPTEMBER 17. Weight, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: STORMY SPELL dueled for the lead three wide, made a bid to draw clear on the turn, then drew off leaving the turn and was hand ridden to the wore to crush foes. FIELD LETTERS was reserved early, made a five wide move on the turn, then finished willingly to be clearly second best. HILL VALLEY was settled early, made a three wide move on the turn but weakened in the drive, held show award. WHAT A BEAUT tracked the pace on the inside and weakened. BESS dueled for the lead on the inside and weakened on the turn and then faltered in the drive. MOSCOWS GOT TALENT tracked the early pace three wide, then got out badly on the turn and weakened.

ENTRY.NAME: Field Letters
ENTRY.COMMENT: reserved early, 5 wide move turn, willingly, 2nd best

ENTRY.NAME: Hill Valley
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle, 3 wide move, weakened, held show

ENTRY.NAME: What a Beaut
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked pace inside, saved ground turn, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Moscows Got Talent
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked pace 3 wide, got out badly turn, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Bess
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled inside, weakened turn, faltered stretch,

ENTRY.NAME: Stormy Spell
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled 3 wide, bid turn, drew clear, drew off stretch, handily,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: PENN NATIONAL RACE 2 1 1/16M Dirt CR: 67. Claiming Purse 10800. (PLUS UP TO 40% PABF) FOR FILLIES AND MARES FOUR YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES SINCE SEPTEMBER 17. Weight, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since February 17 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: JULIET'S MUSIC prompted the pace and made a three wide bid on the turn to draw clear leaving the turn then held sway late to prove best, driving. MIKEY'S JEWEL was reserved early, split rivals two wide leaving the half mile marker and then came four wide into the lane and closed well but could not get to the winner, second best. MARIANNA QUEEN was rated early four wide, came five wide into the lane and lacked the needed rally, bested rest. LIL MISS HOTSHOT vied for the lead on the inside, then set a pressured pace on the backstretch and weakened by the quarter pole. WICKED T passed the tiring rivals. TEACHER DRAMA chased the pace four to five wide and tired. WHATRUWAITINGFOR was settled on the inside and stopped.

ENTRY.NAME: Lil Miss Hotshot
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied inside, set pressured pace inside, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Marianna Queen
ENTRY.COMMENT: rated 4 wide, came 5 wide, needed rally, bested rest

ENTRY.NAME: Whatruwaitingfor
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle, saved ground, stopped

ENTRY.NAME: Mikey's Jewel
ENTRY.COMMENT: reserved, split rivals 1/2, came 4 wide, closed

ENTRY.NAME: Teacher Drama
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased pace 4-5 wide, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Wicked T
ENTRY.COMMENT: void early speed, passed tiring rivals,

ENTRY.NAME: Juliet's Music
ENTRY.COMMENT: prompted pace 3 wide, bid 3 wide, clear 1/8, held sway late

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Dr. K. K. Jayaraman & Dr. V. DeviJayaraman

RACE.RACE_TEXT: PENN NATIONAL RACE 3 6F Dirt CR: 80. Starter Optional Claiming Purse 18000. (PLUS UP TO 40% PABF) FOR FOUR YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $16,000 OR LESS AND WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES OR CLAIMING PRICE $16,000 AND WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Weight, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since Fe bruary 17 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $16,000 (Races Where Entered For $12,500 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SUNSHINE JACK stalked the pace four wide, made a four wide bid on the turn, continued that bid leaving the turn and slowly wore down the front runner late to prove best, driving. NORTHERN SPY dueled for the lead three wide, made a bid on the turn to shake clear, then dug in gamely in the drive but was caught late. ON THE RIM chased the early pace, shifted out and came five wide into the lane and was along for the show award. JACKIE'S PRIDE tracked the pace in between rivals and was two wide on the urn and weakened. FED CHAIR dueled for the lead on the inside and weakened. JUST GOT STARTED tracked the pace on the inside and weakened.

ENTRY.NAME: Just Got Started
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked pace inside, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Fed Chair
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled inside, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: On the Rim
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased pace, came 5 wide, got show late

ENTRY.NAME: Jackie's Pride
ENTRY.OWNER: Bran Jam Stable and Clark David W
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked pace between horses, 2 wide turn, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Sunshine Jack
ENTRY.OWNER: Tribe Dawg LLC and Kline Thomas
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace 4 wide, bid 4 wide, wore down rival, driving,

ENTRY.NAME: Northern Spy
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled 3 wide, bid 3 wide, clear 1/4, caught late

RACE.RACE_TEXT: PENN NATIONAL RACE 4 1M 70Y Dirt CR: 73. Claiming Purse 10800. (PLUS UP TO 40% PABF) FOR FOUR YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Weight, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since February 17 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: WHATA GUY was away alertly to set the early pace while clear and off the rail, remained clear on the turn and then drew off in the stretch after being roused twice left handed leaving the furlong marker to prove much the best. SUMMER ASH was off a step slow, chased the pace three wide but could not gain on the winner and was no match, but clearly second best. ICHIGO had no rally while besting the other foe. HAYROLL chased the pace on the inside and stopped.

ENTRY.NAME: Ichigo
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle, lacked rally, bested rest

ENTRY.NAME: Hayroll
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased pace inside, stopped

ENTRY.NAME: Summer Ash
ENTRY.COMMENT: off step slow, chased 3 wide, , no match, 2nd best

ENTRY.NAME: Whata Guy
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, set unchallenged pace, drew off, driving,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: PENN NATIONAL RACE 5 1M Dirt CR: 80. Claiming Purse 10800. (PLUS UP TO 40% PABF) FOR FOUR YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES SINCE SEPTEMBER 17. Weight, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since February 17 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: VISHNU was allowed to settle early, made a three wide move on the turn, took over nearing the furlong marker and drew out to prove best, driving. POCOPSON STATION was settled back early, made a four wide move on the turn to move into contention, but flattened out while being clearly second best. JOJOMAR vied for the early lead three wide, then went on to set the fast pace on the backstretch, shook clear on the turn and then weakened the final furlong. ILLUSTRIOUS was reserved early, made a inside move but weakened in the drive. BAVARIA vied for the early lead on the inside and tired. COMPOUND IT stalked the early pace and then chased the pace four wide and tired. LONGTAIL vied for the early lead in between rivals, then dropped to the inside on the backstretch and stopped.

ENTRY.NAME: Illustrious
ENTRY.COMMENT: reserved early, inside move, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Bavaria
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied for lead inside, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Longtail
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied for lead between horses, inside backstretch, stopped

ENTRY.NAME: Jojomar
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied for lead 3 wide, pace backstretch, weakened 1/8

ENTRY.NAME: Compound It
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace 4 wide, chased 4 wide, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Pocopson Station
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled back, 4 wide turn, came 5 wide, 2nd best

ENTRY.NAME: Vishnu
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle, 3 wide move, drew out stretch, driving,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: PENN NATIONAL RACE 6 1M Dirt CR: 78. Allowance Purse 28000. (PLUS UP TO 40% PABF) FOR THREE YEAR OLDS WHICH HAVE NEVER WON A RACE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, STARTER, OR PENNSYLVANIA BRED. Weight, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since February 17 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race Since January 17 Allowe d 4 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $16,000 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: KAZ PALACE was away alertly and quickly showed to the front, was well handled on the front end and drew clear on the turn, then drew off in the final furlong while being ridden out. HIGH STRIKE was well placed early, chased the winner on the turn but could not gain on that rival, no match for that rival while clearly second best. MACHO HONCHO was allowed to settle early, advanced on the inside and then lacked a late rally, bested rest. DON'T BLAME FREDDY was reserved early and failed to menace. TRUE QUEEN was bumped at the start, stalked the pace four wide and tired. SPELLED WELL was not a factor.

ENTRY.NAME: Macho Honcho
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle, saved ground, no rally, bested rest

ENTRY.NAME: High Strike
ENTRY.COMMENT: well placed, chased winner turn, no match, 2nd best

ENTRY.NAME: True Queen
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped start, stalked pace 4 wide, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Spelled Well
ENTRY.COMMENT: no factor

ENTRY.NAME: Kaz Palace
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, set pace, well handled, drew clear turn, ridden out

ENTRY.NAME: Don't Blame Freddy
ENTRY.COMMENT: reserved early, failed to menace,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: PENN NATIONAL RACE 7 1M Dirt CR: 87. Claiming Purse 13600. (PLUS UP TO 40% PABF) FOR FOUR YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE SINCE DECEMBER 17. Weight, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since February 17 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $8,000, if for $7,000, allowed 2 lbs. (Races Where En tered For $6,250 Or Less Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SAMARONTI was allowed to settle early, advanced two wide on the turn, tipped out three wide leaving the turn for aim, then hit the front leaving the sixteenth marker and edged clear to prove best, driving. HASHTAG WINNING was allowed to settle early, advanced four wide by the half mile marker, then made a three wide bid on the turn to draw clear, but could not hold off the winner late, second best. CHARGING LION set the pace while in the two path, then was headed on the turn and weakened, bested rest. PURPLE SHIRT stalked the pace three wide and weakened on the turn. MIAMI MUMBLES was well placed early on the inside, made a middle move up the inside to press the pace but stopped on the turn.

ENTRY.NAME: Miami Mumbles
ENTRY.COMMENT: well placed inside, middle move inside, stopped

ENTRY.NAME: Hashtag Winning
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle, 4 wide 1/2, bid 3 wide, clear, caught,2nd best

ENTRY.NAME: Charging Lion
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pace 2 wide, headed turn, weakened, bested rest

ENTRY.NAME: Purple Shirt
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace 3 wide, weakened turn

ENTRY.NAME: Samaronti
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle, advanced turn, tipped 3 wide, bid, edged clear
